div.div: 1. Contractor need to inform the WH team about his arrival to the WH Team in advance so the WH Team can prepare the Materials and make ready for shipment.
2. MRF for Tower Pick should be in advance i.e minimum 3 days prior to the pick up date.
3. Tower / Power will only be transported as one, and on one truck, we will not load tower / Power on two or three separate trucks.
4. Contractor should come to WH with PPE i.e Safety Helment, Safety Shoes when coming to Pick up the Material from WH

div.span: Remarks for material without ERP Code.

div.strong: The above consignment was checked and inspected for HOTO process by the folowing respective representative.

span.strong: The above requirement was checked by the Third Party Logistics, representative and all the items listed above including components listed on the attached packing list match with the Material Request Form

The above requirement was checked and received on behalf of Contractor by their representative who confirms that all items listed above including components listed on the attached GTN / Packing List / Bill of Material are received in good order.

div.strong: Any damages / lost of Tower and Power materials outside warehouse(during loading on improper pickup truck), 100% responsibility and aware by representative who pickup the tower
Registered Office Address : Irrawaddy Green Towers Ltd, 308, Ahlone Road,Dagon Township,Yangon Myanma
